en: Sometimes you really take these for granite.

[i]noun[/i]. 
1. A thin piece of wood that has fallen or been cut off a tree.
2. A long, thin piece of something.
hr: Alfa muški nagon da uzmem štap i hodam kroz šumu.

en: Shame on you for killing such an innocent creature!

hr: Obično se koristi za ubadanje stvari.
